profile.title: Iprofayile yomsebenzisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Akukho sitshixo sabucala kwisixhobo esi ukuze sithunyelwe ngaphandle.
profile.importFailed: Kusilele ukufaka isitshixo (iphasiwedi engachanekanga okanye ifayile yonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Isibini esitsha sezitshixo senziwe satshintshelwa esidlangalaleni.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Isitshixo sakho sabucala asiphumi kulesi sixhobo. Thumela ikopi ekhuselekileyo ngephasiwedi ukuze uyibuyisele kwenye isixhobo.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Usebenzisa i-Free ‚Äî sebenzisa iiSun/Moon ezingxamisekileyo ngezantsi. Phucula ukuze uvule imixholo emininzi.
profile.backupDesc: Yenza iingxelo zogcino ezikhuselweyo ngephasiwedi zezitshixo zakho, uze uzibuyisele kwesinye isixhobo ukuze uvumelanise.
profile.followHint: Amabali abo aya kuvela kwi-feed ethi Ulandelayo ukuba bapapasha kubaphulaphuli abathi ‚ÄòAbalandeli‚Äô (okanye ‚ÄòUluntu‚Äô).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Kukho into engahambanga kakuhle kweli candelo.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Hambisela iifowuni neeSMS ezingenayo kwifowuni okanye i-imeyile eqinisekisiweyo. Ezikhuphumayo zinokubonisa inombolo yakho yeChatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Khetha ubuncinci indawo enye (ifowuni okanye i-imeyile).
profile.errQuietHours: Iiyure zokuzola kufuneka zibe phakathi kwe-0 ne-23.

support.heading: Singakunceda njani?
support.contactIntro: Siza kukuthumelela impendulo nge-imeyile. Nceda ufake iinkcukacha ezisivumela ukuphinda senze ingxaki.
support.sendError: Akuphumelelanga ukuthumela. Thumela i-imeyile ku-support@chatforia.com endaweni yoko.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo okanye igumbi lencoko ukuze uqale ukuncokola

status.filesNote: Iifayile ukuya kwezi-5. Iphela kwiiyure ezingama-24 ngokungagqibekanga.

contactList.updateAliasFailed: Kusilele ukuhlaziya igama lesiqhulo. Zama kwakhona.

auth.headline: Umyalezo okhuselekileyo, wehlabathi onguqulelo ngoko nangoko
auth.description: Ukufihla kusukela ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni, uguqulelo lwe-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, kunye neefowuni/ividiyo.

feature.encryption: Ukufihla kusukela ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga
feature.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ulawulo lwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Kwi-desktop? Skena ngefowuni ukuze ufumane usetyenziso.
auth.scanHelper: Kwi-desktop? Skena ngefowuni ukuze ufumane usetyenziso.
auth.tip: Icebiso: Sebenzisa iakhawunti enye kwiwebhu nakwi-mobile. Imiyalezo yakho ihlala idityanisiwe.
auth.scanHint: Skena ukuze ukhuphele usetyenziso okanye uvule kwisikhangeli sakho.

press.title: Abaposhi
press.boilerplateBody: I-Chatforia lusetyenziso lomyalezo olugxile kwimfihlo olwenza incoko yeelwimi ezahlukeneyo ibe lula. Imiyalezo ifihlwe ukusuka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga, notoliko lwangaphakathi luxhasa iilwimi ezingama-100+ ngexesha langempela. Abasebenzisi banokuvula imiyalezo enyamalalayo, bagcine iziqinisekiso zokufunda zizikhethelo, baze bavumelanise kwizixhobo. Iyafumaneka kwi-iOS, Android, nakwiwebhu.
press.scanTip: Kwi-desktop? Skena ngefowuni yakho ukuze ufumane usetyenziso.

careers.title: Imisebenzi
careers.intro: Siliqela elincinci elakha umyalezo wabucala, wehlabathi. Ukuba ukhathalela ukufihla, ukufikeleleka, kunye ne-UX entle, singathanda ukuva ngawe.
careers.openRoles: Iindawo ezivulekileyo: Ubunjineli (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Imveliso, Inkxaso.

about.title: Malunga neChatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia ngumthunywa okhuselekileyo, onolwimi oluninzi onokufihla ukusuka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni, uguqulelo olukhawulezayo, kunye neefowuni/ividiyo. Injongo yethu ilula: ukunceda abantu badibane‚Äîngokhuseleko, ngasese, nangaphesheya kweelwimi.

values.access: <bold>Ufikelelo kubo bonke:</bold> Guqulela iilwimi ezingama-100+ ngokuzenzekelayo.
values.access_aria: Ufikelelo kubo bonke: Guqulela iilwimi ezingama-100+ ngokuzenzekelayo.
values.control_aria: Ulawulo: Imiyalezo enyamalalayo kunye neziqinisekiso zokufunda zizikhethelo.

about.howDescription: Imiyalezo ifihlwa kwisixhobo sakho phambi kokuba ihambe. Utoliko, ugcino-kwangaphambili, kunye novumelaniso lwezixhobo luyilwe ukuze kuncitshiswe into eyibonwa ziseva zethu.

advertise.title: Thengisa neChatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela kubasebenzisi abakhutheleyo ngendawo zentengiso ezikhuselekileyo. Sinikezela ngeebhanner ezibonakalayo, uxhaso, kunye neepromo zendlini. Ababhalisi bePremium abababoni iintengiso.

adsense.withPubId: Okwangoku sikhonza iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Ukuba ufuna ukujolisa kuthi ngeGoogle Ads, sebenzisa i-ID yomhleli {{pubId}} ucele indawo elawulwayo kwiiyunithi ezingezantsi. Kukho nangezivumelwano ngqo‚Äîsebenzisa ifom.
adsense.noPubId: Okwangoku sikhonza iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Kukho nangezivumelwano ngqo‚Äîsebenzisa ifom engezantsi.

advertise.noPlacements: Akukho ndawo ilungiselelweyo okwangoku. Yongeza ku ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Utyelelo rhoqo oluphezulu kunye nexesha elide lokuhlala kwi-UI yencoko

form.submittedMsg: Enkosi! Isicelo sakho sithunyelwe. Siza kulandela kungekudala.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvulwa umxhasi we-imeyile yakho ukuthumela isicelo‚Ä¶
form.messagePlaceholder: Ukubek‚Äô esweni, imihla, iiKPI, iinketho zendawo‚Ä¶

upgrade.title: Phucula
upgrade.subtitle: Vula isicwangciso esikufaneleyo: susa iintengiso ngePlus, okanye ufumane iimpawu ezipheleleyo ngePremium.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Nganyanga)
premiumMonthly.desc: Iimpawu ezigcweleyo, iiringithoni, kunye nezixhobo ze-AI ezinamandla.

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Ngonyaka)
premiumAnnual.disclaimer: Kuhlawulwe kwangaphambili. Rhoxisa nangaliphi ixesha. Akukho ntlawulo ezifihliweyo.

marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Iimpawu ezigcweleyo, iiringithoni, nezixhobo ze-AI ezinamandla.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: Kuhlawulwe kwangaphambili. Rhoxisa nangaliphi ixesha. Akukho ntlawulo ezifihliweyo.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umntu omtsha kwiChatforia? Esi sikhokelo sikhawulezayo sibonisa ezona zinto zisisiseko ukuze uqale emizuzwini embalwa.

alert.text: Esi sikhokelo siya kukhula xa sikhupha iimpawu ezintsha. Ukuba kukho into engekhoyo, asazise nge

section2.title: 2) Qala ukuncokola
section2.item1: Yenza iDM okanye Iqela uze uthumele umyalezo wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa utoliko lwangoko ukuze uncokole kwiilwimi ezingama-100+.
section2.item3: Zama imiyalezo enyamalalayo kunye neziqinisekiso zokufunda ku Iprofayile ‚Üí Imfihlo.

account.q: Ndiyenza njani okanye ndiyifumane kwakhona iakhawunti yam?
account.a: Khuphela usetyenziso okanye sebenzisa iwebhu, cofa ‚ÄúYenza iakhawunti‚Äù, uqinisekise i-imeyile/ifowuni. Ukuze ufumane kwakhona, sebenzisa ‚ÄúUlibele iphasiwedi‚Äù.

privacy.q: Ingaba imiyalezo ifihlwe ukusuka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni?
privacy.a: Ewe. Imiyalezo neefowuni zifihlwe ukusuka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga. Nguwe kuphela nomamkeli onokuyifunda.

translate.a: Vula ‚ÄúGuqulela ngokuzenzekelayo‚Äù ku Iisetingi ‚Üí Inkangeleko & Ulwimi. Siguqulela kwisixhobo apho kuxhaswa, kungenjalo sisebenzisa ii-API ezikhuselekileyo ngemethadatha encinci.

contact.a: Fikelela kuthi ku-support@chatforia.com. Faka izikrini kunye nenguqulelo yosetyenziso lwakho.

contact.title: Qhagamshelana nathi
contact.errorSend: Akuphumelelanga ukuthumela. Nceda uthumele i-imeyile ku-support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can‚Äôt read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don‚Äôt sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what‚Äôs needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can‚Äôt be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn‚Äôt directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We‚Äôll post updates here and revise the ‚ÄúLast updated‚Äù date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don‚Äôt use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You‚Äôre responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn‚Äôt liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Musa ukuthengisa okanye ukwabelana ngolwazi lwam lobuqu
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi ulwazi lobuqu. Abahlali baseCalifornia basenokuthumela izicelo phantsi kwe-CPRA ngokusebenzisa iqhosha elingezantsi.

cookies.title: Iisethingi zeKuki
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebenzisa iikuki ezimbalwa (umz., iseshoni, ukhuseleko). Asisebenzisi iikuki zeentengiso zomntu wesithathu. Lawula iikuki kwiisethingi zesikhangeli sakho.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Akukho nombolo yabelweyo. Khetha ngekhowudi yengingqi ukuze uqale ukuthumelela iimeseji.

startChatModal.title: Qala incoko
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Chwetheza igama, igama lomsebenzisi, ifowuni, okanye i-imeyile‚Ä¶
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Chwetheza igama lomsebenzisi okanye ifowuni uze ucofe Khangela.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Amanani/ii-imeyile aza kufumaneka emva kokuba uwagcinile njengoQhagamshelwano.

sounds.freeNotice: Usebenzisa i-Free ‚Äî izandi zePremium zibonisiwe kodwa zivaliwe. Phucula ukuze uvule zonke.

aiSettings.title: Iisethingi ze-AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula utoliko, iimpendulo ezikrelekrele, kunye neempendulo eziZenzekelayo zeForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Thumela imiyalezo embalwa yokugqibela efunyenweyo (ecocekileyo) kwi-AI ukuze icebise iimpendulo ezikhawulezayo.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Xa kuvuliwe, iingcebiso ezibuyiselwa yi-AI ziya kufihla amagama aphawulweyo

accessibilitySettings.title: Ukufikeleleka & Izaziso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Iinketho ezenza iChatforia ibe lula ngaphandle kokuxhomekeka kwisandi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Iqala kubungakanani obuqhelekileyo. Yandisa ukuba ukhetha umbhalo omkhulu kwiisethingi zokufikeleleka.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Izilumkiso ezibonakalayo kwimiyalezo & iifowuni
Bonisa iibhena kunye nokukhazimla kwesihloko ukuze ungaphoswa kusebenzo.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vayibhrayitha xa kufika imiyalezo emitsha (xa ixhaswa)
Vuselela ivayibhrayitha yesixhobo ngezisaziso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khazimla isikrini xa kukho ifowuni engenayo
Ukukhazimla okufutshane xa ifowuni ibetha.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Guqulela ngokuzenzekelayo amanqaku ezwi
Ncamathisela isiqendu kwimiyalezo yeaudio oyamkelayo.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bonisa iibhena kunye nokukhazimla kwesihloko ukuze ungaphoswa kusebenzo.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vayibhrayitha xa kufika imiyalezo emitsha (xa ixhaswa)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Khazimla isikrini xa kukho ifowuni engenayo

privacySection.strictE2EE: Ukufihla okuqinileyo ukusuka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Gcina kuphela umbhalo ofihliweyo kwiseva. Icima i-AI/Guqulela kunye neembonakalo zokugweba umxholo.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Khangela ngegama lesiqhulo, igama, igama lomsebenzisi, okanye ifowuni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Yabelana ngelinki yakho yesimemo ukuze niqale incoko kwangoko.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Hlala unxibelelene uhamba ngeChatforia ye-iOS ne-Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Icebiso: Imiyalezo yakho ihlala idityanisiwe phakathi kwewebhu ne-mobile.

randomChat.title: Incoko engaqhelekanga
randomChat.description: Dibana nomntu omtsha kwangoko. Siza kukufanisa sivule igumbi lencoko lexeshana.

login.title: Wamkelekile kwakhona
login.subtitle: Ngena kwiakhawunti yakho yeChatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: I-SSO ayifumaneki ngoku. Sebenzisa igama lomsebenzisi & iphasiwedi endaweni yoko.

error.unprocessable: Isicelo asiqondakali. Khangela igama lomsebenzisi/i-imeyile kunye nephasiwedi.
error.deviceLimit: Umda wezixhobo ufikelelwe kwi-Free. Phuma kwenye isixhobo okanye phucula kwiPremium ukuze udibanise ezinye izixhobo.
